entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 7 May 2023
